title: Patch Notes
content: Jaheira and Isobel reunite after the combat with Marcus. Fixed a pop in the first dialogue you have with Isobel when you approach her at Last Light. Fixed some scene props clipping and sliding from view in Yurgir's lair. Fixed several visual bugs caused by Yurgir's crossbow in the dialogue with him in his lair. Fixed some uneven lighting on Fezzerk at Moonrise Towers. Adjusted Art's position on the bed slightly to reduce clipping. Fixed a shot that was blocked by Art's leg when playing as a shor
